item.description: With 90% of cybersecurity and risk leaders predicting they'll see budget increases in 2025, many are facing a new era of accountability.

item.title: Despite intense AI arms race, we’re in for a multi-model future
item.description: There will be no single model that will rule the universe, neither next year nor next decade. Instead, the future of AI will be multi-model.

item.title: 100% stocks for retirement? A new study says dump the 60/40 portfolio and target-date funds.
item.description: An all-equity portfolio, with a focus on international stocks, could be the key to maximizing retirement wealth, research suggests.

item.title: Boeing’s bonds are again showing more confidence than the stock

item.description: Nvidia has completed its acquisition of Run:ai, a software company that makes it easier for customers to orchestrate GPU clouds for AI.

item.title: ‘He ended up homeless and penniless’: My uncle conned my father into signing over their mother’s house. What can I do?
item.description: “His brother went to the prison where my dad was incarcerated and had him sign over the house.”
